channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: After building works the skip was remove from No 50 Leighton Rd but the owners have failed to clear up what looks like plaster that must have leaked through the skip. The road has recently been tarmacadam and it now looks unsightly., 6th May
item.description:
No 50 Leighton Rd used a skip and left detris behide

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 50, Leighton Road, Fairview, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

Outside the new Co-op construction site on Pilley Lane.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 1, Pilley Lane, Leckhampton, Cheltenham

item.title: TMC - Defects - Covers, Gratings & Frames problem, 6th May
item.description:
28 day with lane 1 closure please lift and relay x1 uneven kerb offlet approx 550x400x20mm stats required. No photos and sizes approximate due to road speed. (Broken Chamber Cover/Frame)
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Poor repairs at road junction and potholes, 6th May
item.description:
All of the Findlay Way needs to be replaced as it has the wrong type of tarmac for the volume and type of traffic. The road is deteriorating and patching it is not solving the problem and only delaying the inevitability so must be replaced to save our tax money.,,,

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 1, Bramble Chase, Bishop's Cleeve
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Sunken and loose drain cover causing excess noise and vibration, 6th May
item.description:

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 1, Bramble Chase, Bishop's Cleeve

item.title: Sign at eastern end of Stoke Orchard footpath 15 (ASO 15) has broken off, 5th May
item.description:
The sign at the eastern end of Stoke Orchard footpath 15 (ASO 15) has broken off. Apologies for the slightly unclear picture. Part of the sign is still connected to the post using a jubilee clip, but most of the sign has broken off.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Stoke Road, Stoke Orchard, Tewkesbury
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Sign at northern end of Prestbury footpath 13 (CHP 13) is pointing in the wrong direction, 5th May
item.description:
The sign for Prestbury footpath (CHP 13) is pointing in the wrong direction. It is pointing towards the east, perhaps as it has been blown by strong wind. It should point southwest (i.e. up the stairs through the churchyard). The issue has been present since late March if not earlier.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Mill Street, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Section of Footpath 14 Shurdington is very uneven going down a bank, 5th May
item.description:
This path is generally easy to follow but even in dry weather this short section is in very poor condition. It maybe that some steps need to be created down this short section of bank to improve itâ€™s safety for users? Https://www.findmystreet.co.uk/map?usrn=40104135
